description: To mitigate the Windows scripting engine memory corruption issue identified as CVE-2023-36017, it is essential to apply specific security updates. Affected products include various Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds, particularly those listed under KB5032190, KB5032199, KB5032192, and KB5032189. For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based systems, the update is KB5032190, while Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64 requires KB5032189. Update packages can be downloaded from the Microsoft Update Catalog using the following links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189, and https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192. Ensure all affected systems are updated promptly to maintain security integrity.
